nodes.bodyText: node-private-key-file also works if no security-module is specified so I think we need to mention that somehow. Maybe "--node-private-key-file will have no effect unless --security-module={} is defined on the command line or none is specified".
this warning will kick if user is explicitly setting non-default security module value i.e.--security-module=nondefault --node-private-key-file=/somepath.
